所有超级接口:
com.baomidou.mybatisplus.core.mapper.BaseMapper<SysUser>, com.baomidou.mybatisplus.core.mapper.Mapper<SysUser>
@Mapper public interface SysUserMapper extends com.baomidou.mybatisplus.core.mapper.BaseMapper<SysUser>
系统用户Mapper接口

  • 方法详细资料

    • selectByUsername

      @Select("SELECT * FROM sys_user WHERE username = #{username} AND del_flag = 0 LIMIT 1") SysUser selectByUsername(@Param("username") String username)
      根据用户名查询用户

    • existsByUsername

      @Select("SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sys_user WHERE username = #{username} AND del_flag = 0") boolean existsByUsername(@Param("username") String username)
      判断用户名是否存在

    • deleteUserRoles

      @Delete("DELETE FROM sys_user_role WHERE user_id = #{userId}") void deleteUserRoles(@Param("userId") Long userId)
      删除用户角色关联

    • insertUserRoles

      @Insert("<script>INSERT INTO sys_user_role(user_id, role_id) VALUES <foreach collection='roleIds' item='roleId' separator=','>(#{userId}, #{roleId})</foreach></script>") void insertUserRoles(@Param("userId") Long userId, @Param("roleIds") List<Long> roleIds)
      批量插入用户角色关联

    • selectUserRoleIds

      @Select("SELECT role_id FROM sys_user_role WHERE user_id = #{userId}") List<Long> selectUserRoleIds(@Param("userId") Long userId)
      查询用户的角色ID列表

    • selectByDeptId

      @Select("SELECT u.* FROM sys_user u INNER JOIN sys_user_dept ud ON u.id = ud.user_id WHERE ud.dept_id = #{deptId}") List<SysUser> selectByDeptId(@Param("deptId") Long deptId)
      根据部门ID查询用户列表

    • selectByRoleId

      @Select("SELECT u.* FROM sys_user u INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id WHERE ur.role_id = #{roleId}") List<SysUser> selectByRoleId(@Param("roleId") Long roleId)
      根据角色ID查询用户列表
